From posture analysis to ergonomic upgrades, Zeliang’s on a mission to save Hazelle (and her spine) from bad office habits. Discover how a few smart adjustments and one seriously comfy chair can make every hour at your desk feel a whole lot lighter!

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 289
programme.desc: Compact, slim, and ready to use straight out of the box. Walk or jog anytime with quiet operation, shock absorption for joint comfort, and adjustable speed and incline. Fold it flat for easy storage-your convenient home fitness solution.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 280
programme.desc: A breakthrough 4-in-1 formula that colors, nourishes, volumizes, and strengthens hair-while improving scalp health in just 5 days. Powered by Korean patented polyphenol technology, it offers safe, natural grey coverage without harsh chemicals, leaving hair darker, fuller, and healthier with every wash.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 261
programme.desc: This La Gourmet Flame Electric Cooker provides you with the best of both worlds by combining a hot pot and grill in one appliance. Enjoy versatile meal preparation, whether you're simmering soups or grilling meats and vegetables!

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 253
programme.desc: This cookware is made with strong stainless steel and a long-lasting non-stick coating from Whitford (USA). programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 259
programme.desc: Kinohimitsu Bird's Nest is hand-picked and traditionally brewed to enhance beauty, boost vitality, and restore energy. The Ginseng Bird's Nest relieves fatigue, while the Red Date & Goji Berry version promotes a radiant complexion

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 233
programme.desc: Sleek and lightweight Thermos Mug with strainer for you to enjoy your tea to the fullest. Suitable for everyday use!

programme.title: The Wonder Shop - EP 274
programme.desc: Kampo Blood Clean Supplement combines traditional herbal wisdom with modern wellness needs. Helps normalize blood pressure, blood sugar, and cholesterol levels. Helps to promote clear, flexible, and elastic blood vessels, reducing stroke risk. Kampo Anti-dampness capsules help remove excess dampness from the body and balance internal energy for optimal health. Helps eliminate edema and reduce water retention._x000D_

programme.title: We Are Big Eaters - East West Battle S4! - EP 10

programme.title: The Joymakers - EP 7
programme.desc: For children living on the outlying islands in the Philippines, getting to the nearest school may require them to swim over a few kilometres or trek through mountains. Though Yellow Boat of Hope Foundation have stepped in to help these children in 200 affected communities, more help is required.

programme.title: The Second Husband - EP 13
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Feng Shanhua overcomes various hardships even after being wrongly accused. This is a story of fate, love, secrets and forgiveness that stem from her relationship with her two families, one of her birth mother and the other of the mother who raised her.

programme.title: Marital Justice - EP 8
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Thai) Although Fan Wen did a good job to defend Bao Er in court, he was caught unprepared when Jia Ming's lawyer summoned a surprise witness.

programme.title: Sunny Again Tomorrow - EP 17
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Zhenguo urges his son, Pu Daojing, to give up unrealistic dreams and return to work at a large company. After a heated argument, Daojing falls into a slump. Seeing his distress, Zhi-en helps him unwind, deepening Daojing's feelings for her.

programme.title: Sunny Again Tomorrow - EP 18
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) On his first day at work, Dongxi meets Heni's mother, Lin En-ai. Both are surprised to see each other as they are longtime neighbours from the same hometown.

programme.title: A Culinary Journey - EP 15
programme.desc: A Culinary Journey attempts to provide the latest travel information in a relaxed and enjoyable program. programme.title: What’s Wrong with Secretary Kim - EP 12

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Merazia Cintamu

Lionil asks Nadia to stop, but she insists on being independent and succeeding in business at her young age.

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.desc: Lionil (Andrew Andika) works as a Public Order Agency (Satpol PP) officer. However, strangely, Nadia (Yunita Siregar), Lionil's younger sister, sells goods on the roadside and is constantly caught in raids. Lionil asks Nadia to stop, but she insists on being independent and succeeding in business at her young age.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 505
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 31
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUTUKLAH AKU DENGAN CINTAMU
programme.desc: A village girl who, for some reason, seems to be "cursed" with an aura that always makes her LOSE in everything, from competitions to neighborhood council elections, so no one wants to get close to her. She is told to approach Elang, a thug who always wins in fights, in order to lose. Unexpectedly, Elang ends up falling in love with Matahari.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 51
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Circle Abang Cilok Mood Banget
programme.desc: Bang Toyib (Masaji Wijayanto) is constantly harassed by Sumi (Shanice Margaretha). Sumi lies to her father, claiming she is pregnant and that Bang Toyib got her pregnant. However, Bang Toyib continues to deny that he never got Sumi pregnant.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 505
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 32
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: LIONTIN AJAIB WHICH IS PEMBAWA JODOH
programme.desc: At a hospital or clinic, Rangga and Intan met, and fell in love at first sight. At the clinic, Rangga only had one pimple checked (he felt overwhelmed because there was a pimple growing on his face) while Intan took her sick father. Well, because Intan's driver was stuck in traffic, finally Rangga was kind enough to take Intan and her father, even when they arrived at the luxurious house, Rangga also helped his father get into a wheelchair and took him inside.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 52
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Pesona Kulimu Mengalihkan Duniaku
programme.desc: While the resort is being renovated, Prilly (Ina Marika) meets a handsome porter named Bara (Ridho Illahi). Prilly is captivated by his handsomeness. However, many people mock her for her lack of taste.

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.title: LITERALLY INI ME VS MOMMY
programme.desc: On her birthday, Ratu (Maudy Effrosina) and her mother, Amelia (Kaemita Boediono), both have a wish. Ratu wants a boyfriend who's older than her, so he can take care of her and her mother. Amelia also wants another partner who's right for her.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 53
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Dodol Inilah Yang Membuatku Lengket Kepadamu
programme.desc: A girl named Marini was forced to marry a loan shark. Marini was determined to work in Garut to pay off her father's debt to the loan shark. Then, there was Mas Raka, the grandson of the owner of the place where Marini worked. He was a grumpy person, while Mas Wisesa was sweeter than Mas Raka. While working, it turned out that Raka and Wisesa liked Marini. Raka was even jealous of Marini because she was closer to Wisesa.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 507
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KONSER SUKACITA NATAL (SPC NATAL)
programme.desc: KONSER SUKACITA NATAL (SPC NATAL)

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik? - EP 3
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang terbaru dan santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 5
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 28
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 23
programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Cik Reen Encik Ngok Ngek - EP 8
programme.desc: Azreen dan Harris terpaksa berkahwin apabila adik mereka melarikan diri pada malam sebelum bernikah. Adakah perkahwinan Harris dan Azreen akan berkekalan selepas Roadtrip Misadventures mereka?

programme.title: NoYa - EP 8
programme.desc: Noya bertujuan untuk mengambil semua kegilaan dan ketawa Aya dan Noreen telah diukir dan membawanya ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 13
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 13
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Skrin Komedia: Tuyul Ke London - EP 5
programme.desc: Drama komedi seram tentang sepasang pencuri bertindak menggunakan seekor tuyul untuk mengembangkan jenayah mereka tapi perancangan mereka membawa mereka bertembung dengan pelbagai hantu yang tak disangka.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 17
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang terbaru dan santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 4
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita (noNI iKI artis koTA).

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 9
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 5
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 19
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 6
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Tabung Lawak S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tabung Lawa ialah pelbagai klip video pendek untuk menekankan topik-topik hangat dalam cara yang lucu

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 29
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: 6 Langkah Menghancurkan Ex-boyfriend
programme.desc: Sha dibantu oleh sahabatnya Qis telah mengaturkan langkah untuk menghancurkan kehidupan bekas kekasihnya Amri kerana telah memutuskan hubungan percintaan mereka.

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series - EP 3
programme.desc: Aiman yang berumur 6 tahun petah bercakap dan berfikiran lebih matang sentiasa membantu orang disekelilingi untuk menyelesaikan masalah mereka.

programme.title: Gelap Geli Tak - EP 1
programme.desc: Game show yang di hoskan oleh Faizal Ismail. Peserta bersaing antara satu sama lain dalam pelbagai cabaran, tapi muslihatnya mereka ditempatkan dalam persekitaran gelap gelita.

programme.title: Jaguh Kampung 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Saksikan para peserta yang mewakili kampung masing masing bertanding dalam acara memasak dengan menu ala kampung.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 5
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 14
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 9
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega kembali dengan penyertaan para pelawak terbaik di rantau ini merangkumi tiga negara Malaysia, Singapura dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Jangan Buat Hal - EP 5
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Life At Thinker - EP 13
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia X SR2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan & sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan oleh pelawak terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 4
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Generasi Gamerz - EP 3
programme.desc: Dua selebriti "Gamerz" akan bekerjasama dengan ibu atau bapa mereka untuk bertanding di dalam cabaran permainan video popular seperti Mobile Legends, FIFA20 & banyak lagi!

programme.title: Prankap Show - EP 4
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular merancang "prank" bersama geng mereka dan mengenakan mangsa terpilih. Berjayakan perancangan "prank" mereka? Sama-sama kita nantikan!

programme.title: Lawak Sorang - Sorang - EP 12
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan " Stand Up Comedy " gabungan antara Malaysia dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Opera Sabun Boboi - EP 11
programme.desc: Pertunjukan komedi lakaran yang memaparkan kemasyhuran pelawak Afdlin Shauki dan Harun Salim Bachik dari Boboi.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2024 - EP 8
programme.desc: Nantikan sketsa yang lebih lucu dengan kemunculan tetamu istimewa,dan cameo yang bakal menghiburkan anda semua.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 29
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 42
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 7
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 5
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Quebec - EP 3
programme.desc: In 1943 a secret laboratory was created at the University of Montreal to conduct research into atomic batteries. It remained operational until 1945. At the time, research into nuclear physics was directed towards helping the war effort.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2

programme.title: Les Cyclades
programme.desc: As teenagers, Blandine and Magalie were inseparable. When they meet again, several years later, they decide to finally take the trip they'd always dreamed of: to Greece! The only problem is that the two former friends now have very different approaches to life... and holidays!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 11
programme.desc: Ilet a Bourse, nestling in the heart of the Cirque of Mafate, is steeped in family lore. A hamlet where several generations grew up together and where few have ever wanted to leave. In harmony with nature, the locals live thanks to a system of mutual help and solidarity.

programme.title: Le Grand Echiquier - EP 6
programme.desc: In the prestigious setting of the Royal Opera of Versailles, an exceptional program dedicated to Charles Aznavour, a monument of French chanson and a cultural ambassador throughout the world. A look back at his childhood, his difficult beginnings, his years alongside edith Piaf, his major successes, his commitments, and his legacy...

programme.title: Caroline Cherie
programme.desc: France, 1789. The Revolution is brewing. In order to ensure the safety of his daughter Caroline, the Comte de Bievres marries her to the sinister lawyer Georges Berthier, future member of the Convention. But the young woman understands nothing of politics and her heart belongs to another, Gaston de Sallanches.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: L'epicerie - EP 26
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils - EP 7
programme.desc: In Pierrelatte, near Avignon, the Ferme aux Crocodiles houses hundreds of specimens in a large heated greenhouse. A luxuriant forest, this area welcomes the animals in a setting that reproduces their environment. Christophe Ollivier walks the aisles with Samuel Martin.

programme.title: Paname - EP 10
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 27
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 30
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 43
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 8
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 7
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 8
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Quebec - EP 4
programme.desc: In 1957, the researcher Pierre Dansereau published ''Biogeography: an Ecological Perspective'', setting out, for the first time, the concept of ''ecosystem'', a term that soon became part of our everyday language.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs ! - EP 5
programme.desc: For Cinco de Mayo celebrations, the contestants prepare shareable dishes inspired by Mexican cuisine. On the menu: colorful pinatas, assorted peppers, and spicy dishes.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Fontainebleau, La Vraie Demeure Des Rois
programme.desc: A totally exceptional palace: 1,500 rooms, occupied by thirty-four kings and two emperors. The Chateau de Fontainebleau, permanently occupied from Francois I to Napoleon III, recounts seven centuries of French history. The monument is described through the story of Charles Percier, a young architect from the end of the 18th century.

programme.title: Les Tresors De Marie-Antoinette A Versailles
programme.desc: In Versailles, in a sublime setting cut off from the world where she barricaded herself, Marie-Antoinette, the most hated woman of her time, cultivated her own style and influenced the tastes of her time throughout Europe. Today, historians and curators present her as an independent woman in search of intimacy.

programme.title: Movie - Goa

programme.desc: The 2025 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup will be the 13th edition of Women's Cricket World Cup. programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2012/2013 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: Three decades on from Manchester United's iconic Class of '92, PL Stories steps beyond the headline names to rediscover the teammates who shared the same dressing room, dreams, and demands of one of football's most revered youth systems. We sit down with the lesser-known graduates who lived that journey first-hand, players whose paths diverged from the global spotlight but whose experiences offer a rare and revealing window into the reality behind the legend.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Dion Dublin looks back at his remarkable Premier League career. From the Manchester United number 7 shirt, to prolific spells at Coventry City and Aston Villa, and all his most surprising and standout goals along the way.

programme.title: PREVIEW - WED 24 DEC
programme.desc: We look ahead to Manchester United taking on Newcastle, Aston Villa's trip to Chelsea and Arsenal hosting Brighton.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 19
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - ERLING HAALAND'S 100
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every Erling Haaland goal as he becomes the fastest player ever to hit 100 Premier League goals.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges he's overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: Three decades on from Manchester United's iconic Class of '92, PL Stories steps beyond the headline names to rediscover the teammates who shared the same dressing room, dreams, and demands of one of football's most revered youth systems. We sit down with the lesser-known graduates who lived that journey first-hand, players whose paths diverged from the global spotlight but whose experiences offer a rare and revealing window into the reality behind the legend.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 20
programme.desc: Few players have left a mark on the Premier League quite like five-time champion, Michael Carrick. This week, the former West Ham, Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United midfielder sits down with the Big Interview to discuss growing up in the shadow of St James' Park, his early introduction to football, and his journey to the very pinnacle of the Premier League.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Dion Dublin looks back at his remarkable Premier League career. From the Manchester United number 7 shirt, to prolific spells at Coventry City and Aston Villa, and all his most surprising and standout goals along the way.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - ERLING HAALAND'S 100
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every Erling Haaland goal as he becomes the fastest player ever to hit 100 Premier League goals.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... THE PREMIER LEAGUE HALL OF FAME
programme.desc: An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 27
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the second of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Gary Neville. From his journey from Class of '92 prodigy to Premier League Hall of Fame icon, he talks us through the moments that defined his legacy at Manchester United. A story on one of the league's most influential right-backs and a leader whose impact still shapes English football today.

programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 26 DEC (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Linland
programme.desc: This week's edition features BODOGFIGHT: Clash of the Nations, taking place from the ICE Palace in St. Petersburg, Russia. The event is headlined by MMA legend Fedor Emelianenko (25-1) taking on UFC Veteran Matt Lindland (20-4). The fight features two of the world's top-ranked fighters in the world, with Emelianenko being considered the sport's top pound-for-pound fighter at the time, and Lindland being an Olympic Greco-Roman Wrestling silver medalist.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Linland

programme.title: WCCB Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: Undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale, they're playing for national pride. All-Stars from "American Ninja Warrior" face off against teams from Japan and Europe for bragging rights.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster

In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.desc: In the season finale, they're playing for national pride. All-Stars from "American Ninja Warrior" face off against teams from Japan and Europe for bragging rights.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Timothy Bradley vs. Luis Carlos Abregu
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a bout between 2 undefeated fighters, Timothy 'Desert Storm' Bradley (25-0, 11 KOs) vs. Luis Carlos Abregu, aka 'El Potro' (29-0, 23 KOs) from the Agua Caliente Casino, Rancho Mirage in California, USA on July 17, 2010.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 63
programme.desc: Tinky Winky and Laa-Laa are in Home Dome when the Tubby Phone rings. It's Dipsy and Po calling from the Tubby Mobile to say 'Hello'.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 3
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'c', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some cute coconuts, a camper van, and meet a cool camel!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: Plom's favourite toy is broken, so Doctor Mae-Mae promises to fix it. But when Doctor Mae-Mae realises she's taken on too many patients, she doesn't know if she'll be able to fix Plom's toy after all.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: Messy and his friends go on a camping trip in OKIDO Forest with Tweedie the Explorer and meet a few more nocturnal animals than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 7
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: It's a snowy day and JoJo and Gran Gran go to the park to build a snow panda!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It has snowed and almost no one can get about. Stanley builds a snow plough out of surf boards to clear the streets and makes a huge snow hill so that his friends can sledge down it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 19
programme.desc: Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realizes there's more to the job than he first thought.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: Messy can't wait for Christmas Day to arrive. He learns that everyone needs to get a good night's sleep, even Mother Christmas!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Evil Pea thinks the Veggies won't like it when she covers the Supermarket in ice, but instead they have the best snow day ever, so she creates a giant snowball to ruin their fun.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) - EP 20
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'snow', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of snow, cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: No matter how fast he clears the path, it just keeps snowing on a Citizen Po's garden!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Kit & Pup are finding out about snow. They go sledging, have a snowball fight and make a snowman.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It has snowed and almost no one can get about. Stanley builds a snow plough out of surf boards to clear the streets and makes a huge snow hill so that his friends can sledge down it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: Duggee's old friend Clarence has lost his Christmas cheer so the Squirrels decide to help.

programme.title: Go Jetters Christmas Special: The North Pole
programme.desc: A special festive edition of the colourful animation series packed with comedy, teamwork, thrilling action, great gadgets, awesome sights and funky facts about brand new places.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran Christmas Special (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran get ready for a Christmas Party. But first they need to pick up the perfect Christmas tree from the Christmas Tree Farm.

programme.title: Garden Tales (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in the garden and many of the residents have never seen snow before. Casey the Badger tells Parker the Pheasant about a snowman in the top field.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: It's summer in OKIDO, but Messy wants to chill out in the snow, so he's lucky when the snowflakes come out to play!

programme.desc: We visit the reindeer of Karasjok, go to the Arctic Wildlife Park to meet Norway's indigenous animals, and see the Finnmarksvidda mountain plateau and the Sapmi Park too!

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Rally driver Catie shows off three amazing machines that move on snow! She drives a snowmobile, shows us lots of amazing snow blowers and then drives up a mountain in a snow groomer.

programme.desc: Dougie is making a festive yule log. His yummy chocolate recipe with redcurrants is a Christmas classic. He also has a themed table gift for all his friends to enjoy.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: CNBC Meets - EP 41
programme.desc: Hosted by Tania Bryer, "CNBC Meets" is an intimate interview series that takes viewers inside the lives and legacies of trailblazers across business, entertainment, sport and politics. programme.title: Unlocked - EP 201
programme.desc: Unlocked is a home tour series focused on how much people across the globe spend on their housing, what they get for the money and what they had to sacrifice to make it happen. CNBC opens the doors to unique homes and introduces you to the people inside so you can see what it's like to live there and exactly how much it costs.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 5
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: CNBC On Assignment - EP 39

programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 1
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

Also, CNN's former Cairo bureau chief Gayle Young speaks with Christiane about her career and recent memoir, "Update", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with tech writer Cory Doctorow about his book exploring what he calls the "ensh*ttification" of the internet.

programme.title: Vital Signs with Dr. Sanjay Gupta
programme.desc: We all know about animals that hibernate., the ones who press slow down or pause on nearly all metabolic functions like heart rate, blood flow, brain waves and body temperature, only to wake up as if nothing happened. It's something humans have never done, but what if they could? And what if the act of hibernation in humans could prolong lives or even save them? Dr.

programme.title: The Situation Room

programme.title: One World
programme.desc: Zain Asher and Bianna Golodryga cover the top global and national issues of the day.

programme.title: CNN Creators: The Intro
programme.desc: Live from Doha, Qatar, CNN Creators follows a team of digital-native storytellers as they navigate the stories that matter most, with a focus on tech, art, culture, sport, and social trends.

programme.title: CNN Heroes: An All-Star Tribute
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper and Laura Coates co-host the 19th annual celebration honoring the year's Top 5 CNN Heroes and reveal the viewer's choice for CNN Hero of the Year.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book "Peacemaker", documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, "The Future of Truth", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with novelist Arundhati Roy about her memoir, "Mother Mary Comes to Me".

programme.title: Seasons
programme.desc: In a world obsessed with speed, new CNN host Laura Jackson invites us to rediscover the beauty of taking our time. Known for her effortless hosting and passion for creating meaningful moments, Laura believes that true luxury is about stories, craft, and connection.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country music's biggest stars. He's also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through."

programme.title: Global Perspectives
programme.desc: Hosted by Zain Asher, this special half-hour program showcases the best of CNN's inaugural "Global Perspectives: On Africa" event, featuring interviews and session highlights with high profile political and business leaders, innovators and thought-leaders.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: The Smithsonian National Zoo is set to reopen its panda exhibit. David Culver covers the arrival of the first giant pandas sent from China to the U.S. in 24 years and examines the history of panda diplomacy.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Erica Hill explores the future of Venice, a city threatened by rising sea levels and the more immediate threat of overwhelming tourism. She speaks with locals working to preserve the city's traditions and address climate change.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country music's biggest stars. He's also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through."

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: With 20% of Americans feeling lonely every day and the number of people without close friends having quadrupled over the past 35 years, Fareed Zakaria examines how the digital age is reshaping the very fabric of human connection.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: From the hurricane-afflicted Gulf Coast to the fire-ravaged mountains of California, communities are rebuilding in the face of disaster. CNN's Bill Weir explores the lessons learned and how we can adapt to a changing climate.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book "Peacemaker", documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, "The Future of Truth", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with novelist Arundhati Roy about her memoir, "Mother Mary Comes to Me".

programme.title: Blueprint
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolia's economy beyond its mining roots, fueled by a young, ambitious, and entrepreneurial population.

programme.title: POV
programme.desc: POV?travels away from well-worn tourist trails to discover the country's essence through the lens of its people. Meet those who dedicate their lives to safeguarding the culture through art, food, and more, and how these facets co-exist within modern culture today.

programme.title: The Journey Matters
programme.desc: Travel and tourism to the Philippines surpassed pre-pandemic levels in 2024. Visitors now focus on authentic and sustainable experiences that preserve traditions, the environment and support local communities.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: The Heat

Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The Observers

programme.desc: Masaharu (Tamayama Tetsuji), who travels alone to Scotland to learn the art of whisky making, meets Ellie (Charlotte Kate Fox) and falls in love. Masaharu dreams of creating Japan’s first domestically produced whisky, while Ellie, who has left her homeland and come to Japan for the first time, faces a series of challenges. This is the story of love and adventure as Massan and Ellie, united by the strength of their bond, through a turbulent era with unwavering resolve.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "The Way of Commerce: Gold and Silver 2" Ep. 2 (R)
programme.desc: The essence of trade lies in "joy for the buyer, happiness for the seller." Season 2 follows Sachi (Koshiba Fuka), who, after overcoming hardships and marrying the 6th heir Tomozo (Matsumoto Leo), faces new trials. As Isuzuya grows, she endures loss, defies convention to become its seventh female head, and boldly opens an Edo branch. With inventive ideas and strong bonds, she builds its foundation- a vibrant tale steeped in Japan’s kimono culture, a heritage now captivating the world.

programme.desc: Imoto Katsuyuki is working to promote financial independence among ethnic minorities in conflict-torn Myanmar by teaching them agriculture - he talks about what is needed to support them.

programme.title: Tokyo Bay Tsukudani
programme.desc: Nori tsukudani is a popular topping in rice-loving Japan - made with local nori from Tokyo Bay, it's a taste and tradition preserved for over 100 years.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: With its splendid branches and white plum blossoms, this famous painting is known for captivating Van Gogh - discover why people were able to tell this was a specific tree at Kameido Umeyashiki.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A farm brings together people with something in common: fear of developing dementia. As they engage in planting and harvesting, staff members observe their actions and help them find a way forward.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Admired by John F. Kennedy, Uesugi Yozan was a feudal lord who took over the Yonezawa domain at the age of 15 - he enacted financial reforms that led the destitute domain to a miraculous recovery.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan

programme.title: Herbal Symphony

programme.desc: Sharp Queen Li Jing and Absurd Master Shen Yulin

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 408
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1863

programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1168
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 18
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today - EP 7

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 15
programme.desc: Kwok-yin finds out Lok-yee is suddenly well off. He knows something is wrong, so he persuades Lok-yee to quit her job. Lam Ping not only feels alright after being assaulted by Lion Kong but also agrees to go to Antarctica to cover more topics. Wing-kei uses her previous experience with Chi-hin to “remind” Chi-hin to be wary of an eventual sad ending. Hau-chim’s quartet blackmail some money changer. Chi-hin reaches the scene while on patrol. He sees Kwok-yin saving Hau-chim.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 16
programme.desc: Westminster suspects Lok-yee embezzles the shop’s money as she finds out her account balance. Tsan’s illness causes him to reflect on himself. He rediscovers his ambition and fighting spirit for joining the police force. He then receives information about some hardened criminal lying in ambush in the shop. Tsan swings into action without waiting for Chi-hin to come to provide reinforcement. He eventually gets into trouble. Lantern tells Yiu-ching he has some preferred son-in-law-to-be.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2112
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 14
programme.desc: Man-sum tells Ching-tin to locate someone that saved wealthy girl Kandy, who was once kidnapped. After interviewing her, Ching-tin confers with Cheung-sing as she thinks her savior was perhaps some gangster. Chi-hin asks Ching-tin to play some video game with him. Chi-hin also wants her to go with him to some concert as he has to complete some family bonding homework.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 784
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 28
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 17
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 13
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 14
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 34
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 14
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 15
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 36
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 37
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 29
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 18
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.
